El juego esta muy bien pero a dia de hoy es IMPOSIBLE encontrar una partida para jugar decentemente, continuamente se queda bugeado y hay que salir con ctrl+alt+sup, cuando al fin entras la gente se cae de la partida y tienes que jugar en inferioridad contra el asesino, personajes que se quedan atascados en mitad de una animación y no pueden salir...

This game is exciting at first and gives you a lot of jumpscares especially at the beginning when you don't understand what's from what.
At this point you will either love it, or hate it, however eventually you'll get tired of it, and all matches are just a grinding of blood points for more levels, more perks, more items, more progression that makes little difference on the long run. The replayability of the game is good due to being a multiplayer only situation, but the single game mode - do objectives, escape, or, hunt people, prevent escape - is repetitive. The thrill of the hunt or being chased gives it a good momentum, until you get accostumed to it and then it is no longer fulfilling.

All this above would still be a kind of positive about this product, but there is more to it.
As the setting is multiplayer only, you have to deal with other people and this is where it goes downhill really fast.
You will occasionally meet people who are fun to play with or against, and gives you a nice laugh, but for the most part you will only encounter the community in chat on the score screen after each match, where the salt comes in. You'll see frustration, anger, and a lot of swearing.
As well as the occasional trolls and griefers who will not hesitate to ruin your gameplay by working against you as a fellow survivor, and still get away with it, as the mods are way too lazy to follow up on cheating/griefing reports.

This would be a good game if it weren't full of camping killers and broken matchmaking. 1 in every 9 matches are worth playing if they don't just flat out crash.

Penalty for camping hooks would be very helpful.

Favorite game <3

Es war mal ein so tolles Spiel.

Das Spielprinzip ist sehr cool und macht auch wirklich viel Spaß. Es ist eine Art Spiel auf die man lange gewartet hat und dann endlich kam. Und es war sehr cool und hat sehr viel Spaß gemacht.
Ein Spiel wie solches hab ich noch nie gespielt und es hat unglaublich viel Spaß gemacht mit Freunden zu spielen.


Nun schleichen sich aber immer mehr und mehr Bugs in das Spiel und als Spieler hat man das Gefühl im Regen stehn gelassen zu werden.
Statt Fehler zu fixen werden nach und nach immer mehr DLCs rausgehauen.

Angefangen hat das ganze als das Halloween Pack rauskam. 

Das Spiel war eine ganze Weile in early access, nun ist es "fertig" und man boxt DLCs raus.
Mir kam es im ersten Moment so vor als müsste man für das wirklich "fertige Spiel" extra Geld bezahlen.

Nach den ersten paar Spielen gegen den neuen Killer "Der Wandler" zu deutsch, viel mir auf das er doch etwas stärker ist als andere Killer. Zumal hört man in seiner ersten Stufe sein Herzschlag nicht, zum anderen hat er in anderen Formen die Möglichkeit ein Überlebenden mit einem einzigen Schlag zu töten. Etwas übertrieben stark, aber nunja. Die dazugelieferte Map ist dazu leider noch sehr klein, es bieten sich viel weniger Verstecke vor dem Wandler und oft gewinnt in solchen Runden dann der Killer. Was keine Überraschung ist.
Nicht nur das man für das "fertige Spiel" extra Zahlen muss, man hat das Gefühl als wird man dazu gedrängt. Denn der Killer ist wirklich sehr gut und man bekommt die Möglichkeit viele Blutpunkte zu bekommen.

Es dauerte nicht lang, da kam das nächste DLC raus. Für mich auch keine große Überraschung mehr.

Anders als beim Halloween Pack, war der Killer sehr ausgeglichen. Überlebende haben eine genauso große Chance zu gewinnen, wie der Killer. Die dazugehörige Map war auch groß und bietet Versteckmöglichkeiten. Es gibt eigentlich nichts zu meckern...wären da nicht die Bugs.

Das bringt mich zu meinem Hauptkritikpunkt.

Beim letzten DLC haben sich unglaubliche Bugs ins Spiel geschlichen die sehr großen Schaden angerichtet haben. Der Schaden war auf den Geiz der Entwickler zurückzuführen.

In Dead by Daylight wird alles Lokal gespeichert. Der Bug hat dazu geführt das die Chars komplett resettet wurden, und der letzte Char sogar Level 0 hat. Was eigentlich nicht möglich ist.

Dies ist mir selbst zweimal passiert und hat mich sehr verzweifeln lassen. Nach 2 Minuten googlen fand ich dann heraus dass davon wohl jeder betroffen sein kann.

Die Entwickler raten in einem kurzen Beitrag im Steamforum seine Lokalen Stände zu kopieren und zu speichern, um sie bei Bedarf zu nutzen.

Leider kam diese Versteckte Warnung zweimal für mich zu spät.
Im Startmenu von Dead by Daylight wird weiter Werbung für DLCs gemacht, statt vor solchen Bugs zu warnen. Dafür ein großes Dankeschön.


Mitlerweile scheint man den Bug gefixt zu haben. Von vorne Anfangen muss ich trotzdem.

Der Geiz von den Entwicklern zeigt sich übrigens auch sehr gut bei den Ladezeiten von Runden.
Eine Runde Dead by Daylight wird immer vom Killer gehostet. Hat der Killer schlechtes Internet, hat man Pech gehabt. Dann wartet man schonmal 10 Minuten bis es losgeht.
In der Zeit sind oft kaum noch Spieler im Spiel. Verständlich, wer will auch schon so lange warten?

Die letzten Bugs haben mich dann so aus der Haut fahren lassen, das mir die Lust komplett vergangen ist.

Plötzlich können Killer ihre Fähigkeiten mit anderen Killern verschmelzen.
Der Fallensteller legt nun nicht nur Fallen, sondern läuft mit einer Kettensäge herum.
Und nun können Killer auch als Überlebende joinen und so komplett die Runden vermießen.

Man kann das Spiel kaum noch normal spielen. Man entdeckt jeden Tag neue Bugs.
Wenn man Langeweile hat, kann man wunderbar in der Community von Dead by Daylight sich über Bugs lustig machen. Es scheinen jeden Tag neue dazuzukommen. Von Hillbillys die plötzlich zu Flugzeugen werden und über die Map fliegen, bis zu Killern, die im Boden versinken.
Es gibt jeden Tag neue Bugs zu entdecken.

Das Spiel ist immerhin wunderbar dafür gemacht den Blutdruck zu erhöhen. Vielen dank dafür.

原谅我一开始没有认真的写评测！！！现在暂时重编写一下
（网络问题比以前好了些，就不骂*人）

1、几个月没玩，现在回来玩了几把，倒地后想听逃生通道的声音，发现背景音乐和游戏声音是一个设置，倒地后背景音乐让我觉得很吵、特别吵、TM非常吵。
差评-1

2、聊天系统仍未开启，除了开黑，就是一帮聋哑人在玩，团队合作全靠意识（和单机有的一拼）。
差评再-1

3、地图和许多游戏一样，并非随机生成，估计没有常年股骨灰党，玩家耐玩的新鲜度体验感下滑明显，归根结底就是自由度过于单一固定。类似如乌鸦设定的过于简单固定了。许多地方需要改善加强，可以弄点尸体什么的上面有乌鸦啊，位置也可以随机不固定啊
一般般+0

总结：起初画质剧情会让新人觉得很赞，但它只给了我们一个完美的情景，可是楚门的世界谁愿久留？
自由度仍需加强才是一款好的游戏。

Изменил положительный отвыз, на отрицательный, сейчас постараюсь объяснить почему:
Главная проблема игры, которая напочь отбивает всё желание играть - это читеры (да эти баги я считаю читерством, использовать баги игры что бы портить остальным игру!) , их много и у каждого что-то своё УНИКАЛЬНОЕ, ладно было время когда люди взламывали очки крови, это хрен на него но другое дело, когда вместо четвертого выжившего, повяляется внимание! ВТОРОЙ МАТЬ ЕГО МАНЬЯК
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=822200502
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=822198235
 и начинает так же как и основной, находить выживших, хватать их и вешать на крюки.
Это еще не всё, есть особые читы, которые возволяют скрещивать двух маньяков в одного, то есть на карте появляется маньяк Трапер и ВНИМАНИЕ, него помимо капкана естьБЕНЗОПИЛА, да да бензопила от Деревенщины,

Обзор дополнен: 06.01.2017
Далее это Баги/Лаги:
Очень часто бывают лаги, когда у меняка включен торрент или он там что-то качает(порнушку к примеру) и когда у маньяка хреновый инэт или он что либо качает, у всех остальных выживших начинаются дичайшие лаги, швыряет из стороны в сторону, фризит и прочие тормоза.
Следующий баг, (не менее раздражающий) - это когда ты берешь предмет (к примеру Туллбокс, с хорошими аддонами) загружается карта и твой перс не то что бы держит его, этот Туллбокс забаговывается у него где то в запястье руки и ничего с ним нельзя сделать, кроме как потерять навсегда, такой баг бывает довльно часто.
Не знаю баг это или нет, скорее да, чем нет - это моменты с окнами и паллетами, то есть почему так происходит, когда твой перс уже перепрыгнул паллет или через окно и отбежал на пару метров, получает удар от маньяка,  который находится перед окном/паллетом, вот почему так??? причем крайне часто и не только у меня одного, у многих такая фигня!!!
Несколько раз были и такие баги (один вид бага, но с разными вариациями), чинишь ты геник и вдруг бац и застряешь возле него во время ремонта, причем ничего сделать с этим не можешь, просто твой перс в позе починки, сидит на месте и ничего и ни куда не может дется, пока его не найдет маньяк и не повесит, та же фигня была и с самохилом, когда тупо анимация забаговывается и ты себя безконечно хилишь, пока не сдохнешь

Обзор дополнен: 08.01.2017
Отдельно хотелось бы добавить про систему репортов, которая не дает никакого толку, был один читак которому кинули репорты и что толку, он как играл так играет себе спокойно, ибо тот же чел с таким же ником нам, попадался снова буквально через пару дней!

Обзор дополнен: 09.01.2017

THIS GAME SLAYS ASS

Dead by Daylight is a fun concept and starts out entertaining enough but the many bugs, balancing issues, toxic community and a seemingly oblivious/incompetent development team keep me from recommending it to any new players.

The game's concept is fun enough: Play as one of four young adults desperately trying to repair five generators to open the gates and escape from a murderous stalker taken from slasher film tropes.  Or, play as the killer and hunt those kids foolish enough to stumble across your lair.  As you gain experience, you can buy perks and gain access to items to help you escape or kill.  When you start the game, it's a fun, heady experience.  Unfortunately, like a piece of fruit-striped gum, the initial rush is quickly gone.

Technical bugs abound, from minor glitches like non-working scoreboards and graphical glitches to moderate issues like broken perks to major issues like all of your game progress being eliminated (the devs recommend you make your own manual save copies) or "infinite loading screens" where the game locks up.  Of course, sometimes it just takes 2-5 minutes to load so you can waste a bit of time on nothing before determining if you're bugged or not.  Even if you weren't bugged, a team mate may be and they drop out leaving you down survivors before the game even starts.  Other issues exist in development choices: the matchmaking is simply terrible and often sticks your Rank 20 newbie with Rank 1-5 opponents leaving you hopelessly outclassed. Region matching is also terrible where the game can't find matches for you -- I am better off seeking a game in Ontario rather than my home region of Chicago because the game will just hang.  Then there are numerous balances issues and exploits that go unresolved.

Frustratingly, through this, the developers appear to be more interested in pushing out paid DLC than fixing bugs -- and for the "Different teams!" excuse camp, if you have critical bugs but lots of DLC makers, then it's time to allocate your hiring resources differently.  They also rely heavily on streamers to promote the game and shower their favorite people with gifts to get good press rather than taking care of their product as recent reviews show.  Famously, one developer recently said on Twitter that exploiting streamers would not be punished because they rely on them for promotion.  When they do try to fix balance issues, they frequently overshoot. There's more survivors than killers so "fixes" tend to be heavy nerfs to killer perks or buffs to survivor abilities in order to quiet the loudest voices.

The game does have promise and is initially rewarding before all the other issues wear away at it.  If you can play with friends, it helps a lot just because most things are more fun with friends.  But I couldn't, in good conscience, tell anyone to spend $15-$20 on the game (plus another $20 in DLC) in its current state. Right now, I'm not sure if it'll ever get there.

La meccanica di gioco è semplice e affascinante.
il gioco è in continua espansione con aggiornamenti e pach nonostante ciò e un gioco con diversi e molti bug.
Consiglierei l' inizio del gioco ad un pubblico che sa o ha già visto giocare qualcuno, perchè nonostante il gioco sia molto semplice come detto in precedenza è strapieno di comandi con trucchi che è quasi fondamentale conoscere. 
Il gioco contiene a suo interno un tutorial ma non è molto approfondito spiega solo le basi ...le cose sottointese .
Consiglio di comprare il gioco se partite con l'idea che giocherete molto e con costanza.
Non è il classico paytowin [Ovvero che più paghi e più diventi forte] questo e un gioco che per vincere bisogna giocare, conoscere i nascondigli più ideali e sapere bene le basi del gioco.
Non consiglio quasi mi di nascondervi negli armadietti...cosa che il tutorial la fa sembrare una cosa fondamentale .

Dead by DayCrash
[h1]Old news 2016
----------------[/h1]
I wait more to find a game than I play. Very often, if not always I get 'Failed to find a match'. If host's PC is made of a potato you'll have a ping like you're playing from the moon. I'm unable to find a match as a survivor.

[h1]Bad news
----------[/h1]
[list]
[*]Update: UE 4 freezes and crashes randomly after UE engine update in early 2017, the so called "HUNG"-bug will ruin the gaming experience. This game is not for AMD GPU users.

[*]It has a very toxic community so you'll need an elephant skin. A lot of garbage and scum playing this game. Not a lot of nice people here. Good killers will get a lot of cancer during match and hate after it in chat. Caution: So much salt, I could use it for a portion of french fries after each match. After you reach rank 1, even below rank 10, the cockiness and disrespect towards the killers is just through the roof. Such as teabagging, constantly taunting, saving team mates in front of killer's eyes is just common toxicity a killer can get. A lot of whiny b*tches ruining this game. As killer it feels like you're a big piñata and survs can do whatever they want to do.
Survivors abuse a lot of mechanics in this game, such as gen-tapping. This abuse negates Hex:Ruin of a killer

[*]It feels like the killers are underpowered. This game is horror survivor for a reason. It shouldn't be possible for all four survivors to escape, which will happen to a new player. Some killer's perks will burn survivors' flashlight and toolboxes so fast that lessens some of cancer, so this helps some how. 'SWF' = Surviving With Friends mode will put a killer against a bunch of friends who communicate and make life for a killer player miserable and put him/her in a big disadvantage. This mode shouldn't even be in game, I guess SWF-players are the cash cow for the devs.

[*]Playing a survivor is pretty straightforward and requires not as much skill as playing a killer. With enough gamemechanic knowledge and few hours of play you can 'palette loop' even the best killers while your friends will repair all generators to escape.

[*]There is no stealth involved on higher ranks and it isn't rewarded to be stealthy at all. One or two looping experts will try to bait the killer while others rush the gens at ridiculous speed. As killer, one can run Hex:Ruin, which slows down the progress but I rather have another perk instead. Some killers are not good at protecting Ruin totems so a match can snowball fast in favour of survs.

[*]Survivors have a lot of "Get out of jail" - card perks. Such as Deciseve Strike or Unbreakable, are crutch-perks yet these are used on rank 1 lvl. Rank 1's if you use DS, you're not skilled, you're just bad. Crutch and broken perks are used in favour of survs. Even if you did good as a killer and downed all survs someone has at least one Unbreakable which will put him/her in injured state from the downed state, just watch Truetalent's stream while he is playing Myers.

[*]Victory Cube update just screwed up every killer, which is not fun. To rank up as a killer, he needs to at least get two sacrifices. In previous builds it didn't matter how a killer got his points for a rank up, now the game makes one to get people hooked and sacrificed, which makes a killer camp and hard patrol a hooked survivor. It's not fun to play as killer anymore.

[*]Some maps are very bad designed for killers, such as Swamp map. 
[/list]

[h1]Good news
------------[/h1]
[list]
[*]The concept of this game is, of course, great. I love this 'Cat vs Mice' - game. If the killer and team of survivors are any good, you'll have great time. The initial "Fear effect" will be gone after you have a couple of hours of gameplay though.
[*]This game gets updates and bug fixes on a regular basis, constant balance tweaks are improving this game.
[*]A variety of killers makes this game very interesting. Every killer has its own perks and strategies.
[/list]

[h1]Verdict[/h1]
It's still very unpolished and very unbalanced, in favour of survivors, with great amount of potential. One of the great asymmetrical survivor horror games on the market atm.
I'm passionate about this game but if the Last Year will come out in 2018 DbD won't survive and it will be a last nail in its coffin.

Devs have no idea how to balance the high rank players. The game feels arcade-ish than skill-based, which is in my opinion a wrong business choice.

Survivors don't need to be as good as killer HAS TO BE to win a round, devs just gave survivors a lot of crutch-perks and add-ons, that will put a killer in a bad situation very fast, and all the time on rank 1 matches. Even if a survivor is outplayed by a killer, he/she still can get away and waste killer's time, while he/she should have been hanging on a hook. 'Surviving with friends' - mode needs to be removed from this game, because playing a killer is a such antagonizing experience and feels more like a chore than having fun, I assure you. If you're facing, as killer, a SWF group, who are using voip communication app  (skype, discord, etc.) you will have a bad time.
A killer player needs to play  an exceptional good game to be able to catch all of them, while survivors can make mistakes and yet escape unharmed.
This game promotes sadisme and bullying.

Da der Killer ja jede Runde hostet, ist auch das Gameplay von seiner Internet Connection bzw. seinem Ping abhängig, das führt zu Lags und auch den meisten Bugs die man in dem Spiel hat wenn der Killer schlechtes und oder langsames Internet hat. Also bitte stellt endlich richtige Server auf (dann wären auch endlich diese kack Bugs weg).
Ich hoffe ihr nehmt euch meine Kritik zu Herzen.

Dead by Daylight is a very fun multiplayer game which has both good and bad things.

Some of the good things are:
-the game is very fun alone and with friends.
-the wide variety of characters means there will be at least one on your preferences.
-reaching level 50 on a character after grinding for a while seems satisfying.
-the huge variety of perks give you a lot of options for play styles, even tho some may be locked behind a paywall, with enough patient you will eventually get some from the shrine of secrets.

Some of the bad things are:
-some of the perks are way too overpowered and some are way too underpowered.
-same with killers, some may be too op while some are just bottom line trash.
-some maps seem too killer sided or survivor sided.
-the rank system is just broken.

But in my opinion, the worst thing with this game is the community. It's way too toxic. I play both roles and from my experience, most of the toxicity comes from survivor mains. They just complain over and over again even tho the game is more survivor sided. 
As a killer, if you came across a toxic survivor there are 2 options:
1.If you are good , they will most likely call you a noob and leave a -rep (which is the most useless thing ever)
2.If you are bad, they will most likely call you a noob and leave a -rep

While as a survivor, if you come across a toxic killer (which is rarely), you'll either be camped or tuneled.

All in all, this game is mostly fun and I say it deserves a chance.

I REALLY want to recommend this game ... it fulfills so many aspects of my love for this genre of movie.  And while i see a lot of other reviews talking about free weekend and hackers etc.  I didn't experience anything like that personally.  What i dealt with pretty consistently upon installation was the unfortunate occurance of loading screen crashes.  Roughly 50% of the time which is unacceptable.  Any before anyone assumes it had something to do with my internet let me reassure you that i pay extra $$$ each month to ensure things like that don't happen lol.

So for now i cannot recommend it.  I've already refunded my purchase, but because the concept is PERFECT essentially, i will hold out hope that they will correct any issues this game has and maybe toss it up on another sale at a later date.  I'll probably give it another go.  Fingers Crossed.

Edited on 18 June 2017----------------

It seems as thought many of the technical issues have been sorted out.  Once it went on sale again, I grabbed it and gave it another shot because i really wanted to love this game.  So far i'm enjoying my second attempt at playing this game.  Other than toxic players yada yada yada, it seems MUCH more playable now.  Changing my recommendation to "Recommend".

Game good.

*************************************************************************************************************I love this game. I enjoy the gameplay and it does give you an adrenaline rush but I can't currently recommend it. If you want to play by yourself, it works fine for you for the majority of the time but as soon as you ask a friend to join you, the lobbies turn into ****fest. You could end up spending 30 minutes waiting in the lobby to get into a game (if you're lucky) where it can either go both ways, there are only 2/3 survivors or you die after 30 seconds because the killer just camps. You can't really enjoy this game with friends at its current build so at this stage I will give it a thumbs down.

Steam matchmaking breaks constantly (it has been broken for months). The developers will probably never fix it, as the multiplayer stack is one of the most complicated aspects of a game's development.

If you don't mind that the matchmaking is severely broken then buy it. You may wait up to 30 minutes to join a round as survivor. Killer (hosting) works fine.

很喜欢这个游戏，基本每天都会玩，然而无数的bug让人十分厌烦，不论是卡技能、蛇皮走位的人为bug，还是一些挂树、救人方面的游戏本身的bug都一直存在长时间没有解决，希望制作组能重视这个问题，别一心只想着出DLC卖皮肤。

平心而论，游戏还是蛮好玩的，无论是生存还是屠夫，都能找到自己的乐趣。乐趣，因人而异，我个人来讲，一个是能跟朋友一块玩，并且有配合有操作，斗智斗勇，挺开心的。
不过说回来，游戏的问题也是很多的：
1、喜闻乐见的steam游戏通病：游戏各种连接困难，如果不挂vpn，基本一次就能登上游戏的情况很难，而且不挂vpn的时候加载也很慢，挂了就是十几秒，不挂可能5分钟。
2、游戏内匹配机制挺不合理的，也许跟玩家还不够多有关。经常新手匹配到大神（1段或者各种满技能的），对于新手其实挺不友好的。
3、刷分这个玩法，很多情况，完全不知道怎么刷才能刷的高。。对游戏的各种细节，了解的途径比较少。
4、游戏玩家的素质良莠不齐，经常能碰到恶意退赛的，而且如果是屠夫掉了，人类通常会掉段位，也是挺不合理的。如果是人类掉了，3V1也挺难的。
5、传说中的挂和改存档，外挂其实我感觉还是比较少的，但也能遇到，最明显的是透视和加速，各种神一样的选手。改档这个就不清楚了，不过很多低段位，低等级的人，各种满技能，超稀有技能满天飞，也是挺无语的。虽然说游戏升级慢了点，但改档和外挂的确有点过分了。

总体来讲，我还会继续玩下去，不过还是希望制作组可以处理下网络、外挂、改档相关的问题吧。。。（而且后面扩展包里面的人物技能挺鸡肋的。。）

This Game Is like *booom* Where the fuck am i when i use the nurse and the nurse take to long to recover after she use all her blink but hey overall this game is a 7/10 would recommend to my other friends.

Dieses Spiel ist sehr spaßig vorallem, wenn man mit Freunden spielt. Aber auch alleine kann man viel Spaß haben. Die Killer Rolle ist zum Anfang die bessere Wahl finde ich. Dadurch bekommt man nämlich einen besseren Eindruck vom Spielverhalten, wie sich die Überlebenden bewegen, ihre Fehler und vieles mehr. Wenn man dann später sich gewappnet fühlt um es mit den Killern aufnehmen zuwollen, empfehle ich es mit einem etwas "erfahrenen" Spieler zuspielen, damit man sich ein paar Tricks davon abgucken kann. Am Anfang sollte man sich nicht unterkriegen lassen, sondern einfach weiterspielen irgendwann wird schon der Spielspaß entstehen. Zudem kann ich auch empfehlen die 2 DLC's zukaufen welche einem ermöglichen 2 neue Survivor/Killer zuspielen.
